local_intent: Execute a controlled push along the cloth edge to form a fold, with visibility check, yaw alignment, contact verification, settle, and retreat.
assumptions: Cloth and edge targets are valid and reachable
coherence_with_global: Matches global plan: perceive/scan, align yaw=90, approach cloth_edge with tight tolerance, verify contact, push 0.1m at 180 deg, wait to settle, and retreat.
